|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),NAND,Compact Flash --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Atmel;AT49BV1614T-11TI; |flash1size = 2 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->

|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Lucent;LU3X31T2-T64; |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 00:40:05 |oui = 00:40:05

}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== '''[[No Wires Needed]]''' Parrot 1148 AP?
'''[[D-Link]] DWL-1000AP''' (MXF-WX1520)
Schematics are available under the documents for FCC ID MXF-WX1500.
The internal photos show the device with a different chip than the schematics dictate (Lucent 10/100 PHY).
[[Category:English Documentation]]
